projects.heading: Dystopia
projects.text: An E-commerce Website created mainly with JavaScript
projects.description: This JavaScript End Of Module Project has been instrumental in expanding my coding skills. From crafting responsive navigation bars to developing dynamic product displays, I've honed my frontend abilities. Proficiency in responsive design and user data handling is showcased through media queries and local storage. Sorting, filtering, and the CRUD system implementation has sharpened my skills in dynamic content organization. Designing polished footers underscores my attention to detail, preparing me for diverse challenges in web development. Overall, this project has transformed me into a well-rounded coder, ready to deliver comprehensive and user-friendly web experiences.

projects.heading: To-Do List
projects.text: An E-commerce Website created mainly with JavaScript
projects.description: Creating a basic to-do list with JavaScript has taught me fundamental coding skills. I've learned how to manipulate the DOM to dynamically add and remove tasks, enhancing my understanding of frontend development. Implementing event listeners for user interactions and utilizing local storage for data persistence has deepened my knowledge in handling user input and data management. This hands-on project has provided a solid foundation in JavaScript, setting the stage for more complex coding challenges in my learning journey.

projects.heading: She Invests
projects.description: The capstone project is a Vue.js-based prediction market application developed using JavaScript, Express, MySQL, bcrypt, and hosted on Clever Cloud. Utilizing cookies for user credentials and product cart storage, with sessions or local storage for enhanced user experience, the project was completed in three weeks. This hands-on experience significantly enhanced my skills as a beginner, providing valuable insights into full-stack development, database management, and deploying applications on cloud platforms.

projects.heading: Calculator
projects.text: An E-commerce Website created mainly with JavaScript
projects.description: Creating a basic calculator with JavaScript emphasized the importance of writing clean code and utilizing functions in my coding journey. I learned to structure my code efficiently, making it more readable and maintainable. Breaking down the calculator functionalities into separate functions not only improved code organization but also enhanced reusability. This project underscored the significance of modular coding practices, setting the groundwork for my understanding of scalable and maintainable JavaScript projects.

projects.heading: First Portfolio
projects.text: An E-commerce Website created mainly with JavaScript
projects.description: Coding my first portfolio website with Bootstrap, HTML, and CSS, while focusing on design and UI/UX skills using Canva, was a transformative experience. I've gained insights into creating visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces. Leveraging Bootstrap streamlined my development process, and integrating Canva-designed elements enhanced the overall aesthetic. This project emphasized the importance of harmonizing code and design to deliver a polished and engaging website, marking a significant step forward in my coding and design journey.

projects.heading: Keyboard
projects.text: An E-commerce Website created mainly with JavaScript
projects.description: Coding my keyboard with HTML and CSS as a student taught me essential skills in frontend development. I learned to structure and style elements effectively, gaining proficiency in creating visually appealing interfaces. Understanding the intricacies of HTML and CSS allowed me to customize the appearance of my keyboard, while also enhancing my grasp of responsive design principles. This project has been a valuable hands-on experience, laying the groundwork for my journey into more advanced web development concepts.

resume.heading: Soft Skills
resume.skill: Problem Solver, Listening & Communication Skills, Updated on Industry Trends, Team Player and Analytical Skills

resume.heading: Technical Skills
resume.skill: HTML-5, Javascript & CSS, Digital Marketing, UI/UX, Github & Git, Figma, Bootstrap Framework, Vue.js Framework and Web Design

testimonial.heading: Testimonials
testimonial.name: Matthew Brown - Lecturer
testimonial.message: Tyhiesha is a hardworking and dedicated individual. Her attitude shows through her dedication and creativity. She is an amazing team player and always shows consistency

testimonial.heading: Testimonials
testimonial.name: Candice Amon - Manager
testimonial.message: Tyhiesha Johnson is an individual who shows up earlier than asked, works hard, and carries herself in a polite, respectable manner. Tyhiesha always presents herself with levelheadedness and grace. She always takes time to spend with other students when they do not understand topics in class.

testimonial.heading: Testimonials
testimonial.name: Natasha George - Manager
testimonial.message: Ty consistently delivers outstanding results with detailed, refined, and high-quality work that exceeds expectations. We highly recommend working with Ty and look forward to future collaborations.

testimonial.heading: Testimonials
testimonial.name: Seth Tobias - Colleague
testimonial.message: Tyhiesha Johnson's genuine personality creates an inviting atmosphere, fostering open communication. Her commitment to improvement reflects high standards and unwavering determination, showcasing excellence in all she does. Tyhiesha's ability to understand diverse perspectives highlights her exceptional qualities as an individual.

testimonial.heading: Testimonials
testimonial.name: Zubaidah Isaacs - Colleague
testimonial.message: Tyhiesha Johnson has good leadership skills. She is dedicated and committed to her work. Being acquainted with her made me realize that hard work always pays off and what you put in is what you get out.

testimonial.heading: Testimonials
testimonial.name: Shaheem Salie - Colleague
testimonial.message: Tyhiesha is an exceptionally determined and hardworking individual. Her unwavering commitment to tasks and her impressive ability to overcome challenges is truly remarkable.
